title: Once again we can't patch our clients properly
body:
every single damn patch there's a problem, this is literally the only game where i've had issue after issue like this.

today my patching froze (not surprising), i exited the launcher, got thrown into the the 33% loop. looked up a fix, deleted some files, didn't work. resorted to repairing client, thought it was all set and then stopped downloading at 86%. looks like i have to reinstall just to patch the game, what should've been a few minutes to patch is now turning into a several hour delay.

i think the client in general is extremely flawed and just needs to be revamped.

replies.body: God bless Adobe Air.  Little indie companies like Riot are lucky to have such a reliable platform!
I update my game yesterday ... Today i try to connect and BOOM the 33% ... I touch the 45k files scanned and it crash -_- I need to reinstall the game after EVERY patch ! This is VERY annoying ...

Same thing. I just don't like waiting that long for the files to load. I just uninstall then reinstall. It works but I'm starting to question if it is really worth it to take 3 hours to download every week to play the game

Hey guys,

If both of you are experiencing issues where the files get into the thousands, with no movement on the patch, it actually might suggest a corruption with the patcher itself.  To that end, make sure that you run through our [Patcher Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), and complete the steps there.  Some of them may seem incredibly simple, but it will allow us to rule out some of those root causes.

Reply back to me if your still unable to patch at all!

Hello Final Raid Boss!

I won't mince words here, you obviously had a pretty shitty experience, and I want to make sure that this is something we can either resolve, or completely prevent in the future.

Given that you mentioned that you took some time to perform a full re-install, I wanted to check in to see if this worked!  If so, it actually points to a more specific issue that may be the root cause, and maybe something we can look into further.

Feel free to reply back and let me know!
won't even work for me when i uninstall and reinstall. guess i wasted over $200 dollars on a game i can't play
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/J80MQrVL-league-of-legends-downloadupdate-0kbps-fix I hope my forum is usefull. :D
Same here. I'm having this problem an now its stuck at calculating differences
Okay so Im not the only one, good to know.

I dont know who is the one who tracks the leaverbuster but it needs to stop. i play a game fine and then i play a game a little later on in the same day and my client wont let me load past that game because of the firewall...if its not one thing its another with yall. and i spend ALOT of money. i have tried to email yall about taking me off of priority queue for some time now and if i dont get a serious reply, and not just some auto email i will not be spending ANYMORE money on this game. i am fed up that i ask just one simple thing and it takes 2 plus days to get a reply, which didnt even help me in my problem to begin with. I AM on my last straw with riot. YOU GUYS NEED TO FIX YOUR CLIENT cause ive had problems in the recent patches and have been penalized for it. Solve my low priority queue if you want me to continue buying Rp, or i boycott.  


SINCERALY, 
   A concerned summoner.
